_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five kinds of people who dwell at th: A person may dwell at the root of a tree because of stupidity
A person may dwell at the root of a tree because of bad desires
A person may dwell at the root of a tree because of madness
A person may dwell at the root of a tree because it is praised by the Buddhas
A person may dwell at the root of a tree for the sake of having few wishes
